member.name: NL_ADDRESS_TYPE
member.summary: The NL_ADDRESS_TYPE enumeration type specifies the IP address type of the network layer.

member.name: NL_ADDRESS_TYPE.NlatUnspecified
member.summary: The unspecified IP address. For example, for IPv4, this address is 0.0.0.0.

member.name: NL_ADDRESS_TYPE.NlatUnicast
member.summary: Any IPv4 or IPv6 unicast address.

member.name: NL_ADDRESS_TYPE.NlatMulticast
member.summary: An IPv4 or IPv6 multicast address.
